it.unimi.di.law.warc.records

Interface WarcRecord

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractWarcRecord, HttpRequestWarcRecord, HttpResponseWarcRecord, InfoWarcRecord

    public interface WarcRecord
    An interface describing a WARC record.

    Required factory method: a concrete type T implementing this interface must provide a factory method with signature 

    public static T fromPayload( final HeaderGroup warcHeaders, final BoundSessionInputBuffer payloadBuffer ) throws IOException;
    and update the WarcRecord.Type enum.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      static class  WarcRecord.Type
      An enumeration of implemented record types.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static ProtocolVersion PROTOCOL_VERSION
      The version of the supported format.

        static final ProtocolVersion PROTOCOL_VERSION
        The version of the supported format.

    • Method Detail

      • write

        void write(OutputStream output,
         ByteArraySessionOutputBuffer buffer)
           throws IOException
        Writes the WARC record.
        Parameters:
        output - the stream where to write the record.
        buffer - a buffer that will be optionally used by the writer.
        Throws:
        IOException

      • getWarcHeaders

        HeaderGroup getWarcHeaders()
        Returns the WARC headers.
        Returns:
        the WARC headers.

      • getWarcHeader

        Header getWarcHeader(WarcHeader.Name header)
        Returns the specified WARC header.
        Parameters:
        header - the name of the header to return.
        Returns:
        the header, or null if the header is not present.

      • getWarcRecordId

        UUID getWarcRecordId()
        Returns the WARC-Record-ID header.
        Returns:
        the record UUID.
        Throws:
        IllegalStateException - in case the header (which is mandatory) is not present.

      • getWarcType

        WarcRecord.Type getWarcType()
        Returns the WARC-Type header.
        Returns:
        the record type.
        Throws:
        IllegalStateException - in case the header (which is mandatory) is not present.

      • getWarcDate

        Date getWarcDate()
        Returns the WARC-Date header.
        Returns:
        the record creation date.
        Throws:
        IllegalStateException - in case the header (which is mandatory) is not present.

      • getWarcContentLength

        long getWarcContentLength()
        Returns the WARC Content-Length header.
        Returns:
        the record payload length.
        Throws:
        IllegalStateException - in case the header (which is mandatory) is not present.

      • getWarcTargetURI

        URI getWarcTargetURI()
        Returns the WARC-Target-URI header.
        Returns:
        the record target URI.
